scripts.start: echo VITE_CONTRACT_NAME=$(cat contract/neardev/dev-account) > ./frontend/.env && cd frontend && yarn start
scripts.deploy: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/silver_octo_waffle.wasm
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
